subject: Bicycles and Bicycling
Tour de France (Bicycle Race)
Cycling, Road
Blacks
lead_paragraph: Daniel Teklehaimanot and Merhawi Kudus ride for the Tour’s first modern African team, MTN-Qhubeka, which hopes to make Africa an important force in cycling.
snippet: Daniel Teklehaimanot and Merhawi Kudus ride for the Tour’s first modern African team, MTN-Qhubeka, which hopes to make Africa an important force in cycling.
